channel.title: CVE Feed for Microsoft Corporation -- Device Guard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Microsoft Corporation -- Device Guard

item.title: CVE-2017-0007|2024-08-05T12:47:57.731Z -- microsoft%20corporation -- device%20guard
item.description: Device Guard in Microsoft Windows 10 Gold, 1511, 1607, and Windows Server 2016 allows remote attackers to modify PowerShell script without invalidating associated signatures, aka "PowerShell Security Feature Bypass Vulnerability."
